title.narrative: Development of Referral Mechanisms for Provision of Solutions to the Identified Community Social Needs based on successful EU practices

description.narrative: "Activities of the project 1) Contracting a Consultant/Expert to develop referral mechanisms for provision of solutions to the identified community social needs based on successful practices of communities in EU countries 2) Trainings for LSGs (Local Self Governance organizations) and COs (Community organizations). The activity number 1 is to assure that the identified community social needs are not just identified and listed down in the Community Development Four Year Plans but there are also working mech anisms enabling the local authorities to solving those issues. The referral mechanisms will be developed by an International Expert. The activity number 2 is to assure the presence of trained cadre of LSGs and COs capable to solve the social needs/issues based on the European model and successful practices for referral mechanisms thus assuring sustainable growth and basics for improving the social conditions of the community residents. The training will be conducted in Yerevan with participation of the In ternational Expert. A ""Guide on referral mechanisms for provision of solutions to the identified community social needs"" will be developed printed and distributed to representatives of LSGs and COs of all communities in 10 marzes (areas) of Armenia to as sure their awareness and further solving the community social issues outlined in the Community Development Four Year plan based on those referral mechanisms. The Specific Objective of the Action is to support to poverty reduction in the regions of Armenia in close cooperation with the local authorities and community organizations to provide sustainable community development based on the identified community social needs."
